posts.body: Just ordered 40+ baofengs, what antennas or accessories other than spare batteries should I pick up

>>77c6e50d-7802-4aa3-8294-aa193edfe409
ActivityPub is what you are looking for anon. AKA Mastodon, Gab, Pleroma, Misskey, PixelFed, Peertube. It's a w3c-acknowledged open standard that's only getting better. 

Don't use Gab's server (it's an FBI honeypot) but sites like freespeechextremist are pretty cool, the guy designing Lokinet is also involved in the development of Pleroma.
